Penandatangan1_name.instruction: {if superintendant name is wahyu wijaya or muhammad angga utama putranto, then the Penandatangan1_title will be VICE PRESIDENT INFRASTRUKTUR TI PT TERMINAL PETIKEMAS SURABAYA, else if superintendant name is Kang David or Rio Setiady Prismarendra, then the Penandatangan1_name will be dodo priambodo all uppercase}

Penandatangan1_title.instruction: {if superintendant name is wahyu wijaya or muhammad angga utama putranto, then the Penandatangan1_title will be VICE PRESIDENT INFRASTRUKTUR TI PT TERMINAL PETIKEMAS SURABAYA, else if superintendant name is Kang David or Rio Setiady Prismarendra, then the Penandatangan1_title will be  VICE PRESIDENT PERANGKAT LUNAK PT TERMINAL PETIKEMAS SURABAYA all uppercase}
